SVXY.long_name: ProShares Short VIX Short-Term Futures ETF
SVXY.summary:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to one-half the inverse (-0.5x) of the performance of the S&P 500 VIX Short-Term Futures Index for a single day.
 The index seeks to offer exposure to market volatility through publicly traded futures markets and is designed to measure the implied volatility of the S&P 500 over 30 days in the future.

UVXY.long_name: ProShares Ultra VIX Short-Term Futures ETF
UVXY.summary:
The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to one and one-half times (1.5x) the performance of the S&P 500 VIX Short-Term Futures Index for a single day.
 The index seeks to offer exposure to market volatility through publicly traded futures markets and is designed to measure the implied volatility of the S&P 500 over 30 days in the future.

VIIXF.summary:
The investment seeks to replicate, net of expenses, the return of the daily performance of the S&P 500 VIX Short-Term Futures index.
 The index was designed to provide investors with exposure to one or more maturities of futures contracts on the VIX, which reflects implied volatility of the S&P 500 Index at various points along the volatility forward curve. The calculation of the VIX is based on prices of put and call options on the S&P 500 Index. The ETNs are linked to the daily return of the index and do not represent an investment in the VIX.

VIXM.summary:
The investment seeks investment results, before fees and expenses, that match the performance of the S&P 500Â® VIX Mid-Term Futures Index.
 The fund seeks to meet its investment objective, by taking long positions in VIX futures contracts. It will also hold cash or cash equivalents such as U.S. Treasury securities or other high credit quality, short-term fixed-income or similar securities (such as shares of money market funds) as collateral for Financial Instruments and pending investment in Financial Instruments.

VIXY.summary:
The investment seeks investment results, before fees and expenses, that over time, match the performance of the S&P 500 VIX Short-Term Futures Index for a single day.
 The index seeks to offer exposure to market volatility through publicly traded futures markets and is designed to measure the implied volatility of the S&P 500 over 30 days in the future.

VXX.short_name: iPath Series B S&P 500 VIX Shor
VXX.long_name: iPath Series B S&P 500 VIX Short-Term Futures ETN
VXX.summary:
The investment seeks return linked to the performance of the S&P 500Â® VIX Short-Term Futures Index TR.
 The ETN offers exposure to futures contracts of specified maturities on the VIX index and not direct exposure to the VIX index or its spot level. The index is designed to provide investors with exposure to one or more maturities of futures contracts on the CBOE Volatility IndexÂ®.

XVZ.summary:
The investment seeks to provide investors with exposure to the S&P 500Â® Dynamic VIX Futuresâ¢ Total Return Index.
 The S&P 500Â® Dynamic VIX Futuresâ¢ Total Return Index (the "index") is designed to dynamically allocate between the S&P 500Â® VIX Short-Term Futuresâ¢ Index Excess Return and the S&P 500Â® VIX Mid-Term Futuresâ¢ Index Excess Return by monitoring the steepness of the implied volatility curve. The index seeks to react positively to overall increases in market volatility and aims to lower the roll cost of investments linked to future implied volatility.

ZIVZF.long_name: VelocityShares Daily Inverse VIX Medium-Term ETN
ZIVZF.summary:
The investment seeks to replicate, net of expenses, the inverse of the daily performance of the S&P 500 VIX Mid-Term Futures index.
 The index was designed to provide investors with exposure to one or more maturities of futures contracts on the VIX, which reflects implied volatility of the S&P 500 Index at various points along the volatility forward curve. The calculation of the VIX is based on prices of put and call options on the S&P 500 Index. The ETNs are linked to the daily inverse return of the index and do not represent an investment in the inverse of the VIX.
